body_html:
Could you elaborate more? As I understand the only place that dtype is used is decode_raw, but self._dtype is used here already.

Also I point to the https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.8/tensorflow/contrib/slim/python/slim/data/tfexample_decoder.py while you have pointed to older code and it have changed since that time.

body:
Could you elaborate more? As I understand the only place that `dtype` is used is `decode_raw`, but `self._dtype` is used here already.

Also I point to the https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.8/tensorflow/contrib/slim/python/slim/data/tfexample_decoder.py while you have pointed to older code and it have changed since that time.
